column1: Little Goat Diner////For a girl who loves breakfast at any hour of the day
column2: Little Goat was the spot for me. While their burgers
column4: and mac n' cheese are all amazing in their own right
column5: I have to order the Fat Elvis Waffles every time I visit this restaurant
column6: which has an upscale but welcoming diner feel.  Not a waffle fan? Just ask for this dish with pancakes instead.  The combination of bananas
column8: and peanut butter-butter (yes that's a thing) will having you dreaming of your meal for days and dying to make a return trip.
